oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Detail from "The Essence of Mertie"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sculpture; Buckman Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mertie Buckman was one of Christian Brothers University's major donor and a Memphis philanthropist. CBU commissioned sculptor Jill Burkee to memorialize her in "The Essence of Mertie," a sculpture on display in Buckman Hall.
